channel.title: briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Faith and Credit
item.description: We try to demystify the bond market.

item.title: Why Japan sees President Trump's tariffs as a 'national crisis'
item.description: Although largely paused, President Trump's tariffs present a major threat to Japan's already flagging economy.

item.title: Are manufacturing jobs actually special?
item.description: More than half of American workers don't have a college degree. Is manufacturing a ticket for them to the middle class?

item.title: Zelensky Is Expected in Berlin as Merz Steps Forward as Key Backer of Ukraine
item.description: A likely focus of talks between the two leaders will be military aid and whether Germany will provide Ukraine with the Taurus cruise missile.
